summary: THE FIRST TIME THIS HAPPENED, I HIT A POTHOLE. THE BRAKES FELT LOOSE/SPONGY, AND I HAD TO PRESS DOWN ALL THE WAY FOR THE BRAKES TO WORK. I PUMPED THEM A FEW TIMES, AND IT SEEMED TO FIX THE PROBLEM. IT WAS RAINING A BIT THE OTHER DAY. I TURNED, AND BRAKES A LITTLE AND FELT THE ABS KICK IN. AFTER THAT, I WAS COMING TO A STOP LIGHT. I BEGAN TO BRAKE, BUT HAD TO PRESS DOWN ABOUT HALFWAY TO EVEN BEGIN BRAKING, AND ALL THE WAY TO BRAKE COMPLETELY. THIS PROBLEM HAS CONTINUED SINCE THEN, EVEN WITHOUT RAIN
